params.borrows: Amount of assets lent out to borrowers by the vault
params.cash: Amount of assets held directly by the vault
params.vault: Address of the vault to compute the new interest rate for

returns._0: Then new interest rate in second percent yield (SPY), scaled by 1e27

returns._0: Then new interest rate in second percent yield (SPY), scaled by 1e27

baseRate().notice: Base interest rate applied when utilization is equal zero
